程序包 consoleVersion1

类 WhiskerRobot

java.lang.Object
consoleVersion1.WhiskerRobot
public class WhiskerRobot extends Object
WhiskerRobot class represents a robot that can navigate an arena, detect treasures and bombs, and handle collisions. Author: Zichen Liao

  • 字段概要

  • 构造器详细资料

    • WhiskerRobot

      public WhiskerRobot(double x, double y, double radius, double whiskerLength, double angle)
      Constructs a WhiskerRobot with specified parameters.
      参数:
      x - the x-coordinate of the robot
      y - the y-coordinate of the robot
      radius - the radius of the robot
      whiskerLength - the length of the whiskers
      angle - the initial angle of the robot

  • 方法详细资料

      参数:

      y - the y-coordinate of the treasure

      public void checkCollisionAndTurn(double arenaWidth, double arenaHeight)
      Checks for collisions and turns the robot if necessary.
      参数:
      arenaWidth - the width of the arena
      arenaHeight - the height of the arena

      public static void moveTreasureAndBomb(String direction)
      Moves the treasure and bomb in the specified direction.
